Preterite.turoyo: mədle l-i=mḥato w-xrizole l-ṣawʕe, ʕamuqo, w-naqlaadmokomonafəq. w-ḥṣəḷḷe w-ṭəryolehawxa, w-u=admokonoḥət
translations: He took the needle, stuck it deep into his finger, and the dark red blood came through. Then he pressed and kept the needle, and the blood streamed down’

Infectum-wa.turoyo: g-ḥəṣró-way-no-la b-iḏoṯihawxaməbló-way-no-la w gamṭó-way-no-la b-u=kisohōl d-nəšfo-wahani m-aʕ=ʕənwekarkūš, w-ḥəṣrə́n-wa-nne-ze. ḥəṣrə́n-wa-nne-ze b-u=aṯro, saymə́n-wa-nnedibəskarkūš
translations: grapes. And we pressed them. Pressed them in (our) homeland and made them into grape syrup’
